COMMENTS: The statistic assigned to BUILDINGS_DAMAGED is expressed as "Houses damaged" in the main reference.

Geo locations: Atumatyoo, Hayakitatyoo, Sapporosi_Atubetuku, Sapporosi_Higasiku, Sapporosi_Kitaku, Sapporosi_Minamiku, Sapporosi_Nisiku, Sapporosi_Siroisiku, Sapporosi_Teeneku, Sapporosi_Toyohiraku, Sapporosi_Tyuuooku (Adm2).

This should be taken as the most reliable source as it is an official report from the Japanese government 4.5 months following the event; DISPLACED_POPULATION refers to peak evacuees in shelters in the earlier report on 2018/09/11; building damage refers to housing damage where BUILDINGS_DAMAGED is the sum of those partially destroyed and partially damaged. Non-residential damage data also exists in the report (2,456 other non-residential buildings)
